summary: This period piece is a fictional biography of a cult leader's rise to power and his subsequent descent into isolation and paranoia.
cast: Cliff Roca|Tom Luce|Eric Rath|Christine Eads|Jeff Hughes|Tad Brown|Al Reidel|Bob Minton|Margaret Mary Bastick|Duncan Pierce|Jeff Jacobsen|Jesse Prince|Terry Maki|Jack Amos|Brandon Beaver|Michael Danish|Derek Lee|Stephan Moreno|Sandy Nelson|Lanny Fuettere|Austen White|Frank Oliver|Jane Eaton|Zachary Beeno|Brian Peters|Jerry Ascione|Ryan Paul James|Ken Dandar|Daryl Hazel|Nelson J. title: The Profit
